name: Filesystem
description: Secure file system access. Read, write and manage files in allowed directories.
full_description: Give your agent the ability to interact with the local file system. This server provides tools to list directory contents, read files, write new files, and manage metadata. Access is restricted to specified directories for security.

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List files and folders in a path.

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the text content of a file.

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Create or overwrite a file with given content.

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: View file size and modification time.
